urls.title: Covid 19 : International travel
urls.description: From the onset of the crisis, the port health control mechanism helped to protect our health system and hold back the introduction into the national territory of variants with alarming features. Mobilising on a weekly basis up to 6,000 members of the civil security service to carry out tests, border guards to check travellers’ health documents and internal security forces to oversee the isolation or quarantine measures decreed by the prefects, this mechanism was duly adjusted in response to the changing

data.text: @MrunaliniDesh11 @AirFranceKLM @AirFranceUK @airfrance Thank you for reaching out to us. Eligibility scope and process for travel is available on our website- https://t.co/XaBfqrmGbC. For assistance connect with the customer contact centre at India Toll Free: 1800-4192-033 or  paid line  91 124 623 3502 b/w 0900hrs – 1700hrs. Regards

data.text: @VishalBudhani @airfrance Hello, Vishal. Thank you very much for your warm feedback. We are glad to know our service has met your expectation. Kind regards,
@Ss_Karamoko We regret the inconvenience caused. Kindly share you booking details via Direct Message for us yo check and assist. Regards,

@rahulraipelly1 @dakugandhi @krishnahari_01 Hello Rahul, thank you for reaching out to us. To avoid inconvenience, please book your tickets & make travel arrangements only if you qualify as per the defined criteria. Eligibility scope and process for travel is available on our website - https://t.co/XaBfqrmGbC . . Regards,

Your safety remains our priority.
To protect you and others, we continue to strictly apply all health measures at each stage of your journey  - https://t.co/ofsvugC9tL https://t.co/l1IoUV0Zm4
@Srimanta66 @makemytripcare Hello Srimanta, thanks for reaching out to us. Please send us a message via Direct message for further assistance.
India - Paris - India flight schedule is updated until 30th September 2020. For scope and bookings visit:  https://t.co/Xl24AIUAXC https://t.co/FAo8FQ1pz9

data.text: @SharmaaAbhishek Hello Abhishek, flights by Air France are in strict compliance with EXIT regulations as defined by the local authorities in India. To avoid inconvenience, please book your tickets only if you qualify as per the defined criteria. Eligibility scope - https://t.co/XaBfqrmGbC Regards
@swatindian Hello Ma'am, kindly share your local India contact number via DM for our reservations team to connect with you and assist with required information. Regards
